title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 67.4 - Intervention, objections; how raised; evidence thereon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 67.4 - Intervention, objections; how raised; evidence thereon

State Regulations

Any person or party affected or likely to be affected by an
application for approval of a corporate document may appear and be heard in
support or in opposition thereto. The board may, in its discretion, direct
objections to be filed in writing and adjourn the proceeding to allow all
parties a reasonable opportunity to submit evidence thereon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
67.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
